title: Developing Techniques to Measure Student Engagement and Motivation in Online Mathematics Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics knowledge (calculus-level) and experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Short-term intensive applied calculus course conducted through 15-minute mobile device-based modular learning

learning_goals: Learners can measure online learning engagement metrics with 85% accuracy using the EDLI (Emergence, Duration, Latency, Interval) framework
Learners can improve learning persistence rates by 20% by designing at least three motivation strategies in mobile learning environments
Learners can visualize individual participation patterns using learning data analysis tools and propose customized feedback solutions
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
